page.title: 16DAY IN LIFE OF MRS MORRISON
page.content: I GET UP AROUND 7.30 AND HAVE BREAKFAST AND GET JOHN'S LUNCH PACKED WHICH HE TAKES WITH HIM. THEN I GO TO THE BUNGALOWS AND DO ANY SMALL JOBS ETC, AND ANY SHOPPING. AT 10.30 I COME INTO SCHOOL AND HELP IN THE KITCHEN AND THE DINING HALL,HAVE MY OWN LUNCH AND GO BACK TO THE BUNGALOWS AND SPEND AN HOUR WITH MY MOTHER. AT 4P.M. I GO INTO THE SHOP AND HELP FOR TWO HOURS. AFTER LEAVING I CHECK EVERYTHING IS ALRIGHT AT THER BUNGALOW AND GO HOME TO GET THE EVENING MEAL. AFTER, I DO ANY CHORES AND PERHAPS DO SOME COOKING OR GO IN THE GARDEN FOR AN HOUR. AROUND 8.50PM I SIT DOWN AND READ THE PAPER OR WATCH TV OR KNIT. I LIKE TO RETIRE ABOUT 11PM.
